ItemTooltips.travel_boots: Great late-game replacement for Tranquils, will free up an inventory slot and with Drum+Manta you will have close to 500 move speed.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: It's generally better to buy the Ogre Club first.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Grab if you're going against an enemy with Evasion, either through an item (Butterfly, Heaven's Halberd, Talisman of Evasion) or skill (Phantom Assasin).
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Remember to toggle the aura off when you're farming the lane, and back on when you want to push.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots: You can finish these at the side-shop, and will allow you to stay in lane and heal after engagements.

AbilityTooltips.luna_eclipse: Your Beams can hit creeps, so try and use it when there are just enemy heroes around.
